title: Consolidate and move deployment documentation to docs/
description:
Merge DEPLOYMENT.md and PODMAN.md into streamlined deployment guide in docs/how-to/.

## Current State

**DEPLOYMENT.md (570 lines)**
- Production deployment guide (systemd, nginx, monitoring, backups)
- Likely contains obsolete or overly detailed content

**PODMAN.md (527 lines)**  
- Podman-specific deployment alternative
- Overlaps with DEPLOYMENT.md
- Contains 'lots of useless stuff'

## Goal

Create concise, focused deployment documentation in docs/how-to/deployment.md

## Tasks

1. **Audit both files** - Identify essential vs obsolete content
2. **Extract core content:**
   - Basic deployment (systemd service)
   - Docker/Podman options (consolidated)
   - Production considerations (concise)
3. **Create docs/how-to/deployment.md**
   - Follow Diátaxis how-to guide style
   - Focus on practical deployment recipes
   - Docker AND Podman in one guide
4. **Delete root-level files:**
   - Remove DEPLOYMENT.md
   - Remove PODMAN.md
5. **Update references** - Fix any links to these files

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] docs/how-to/deployment.md created with streamlined content
- [ ] Both Docker and Podman covered concisely
- [ ] DEPLOYMENT.md deleted from root
- [ ] PODMAN.md deleted from root
- [ ] No broken references to old files
- [ ] Follows Diátaxis how-to guide style
